description:
The 1989 cult comedy classic UHF, starring a young Wierd Al Yankovic, is finally getting the 4K Blu-ray treatment this summer to coincide with its 35th anniversary. The new release will include plenty of special features to enjoy along with the new 4K remastering. UHF's 4K Blu-ray version drops on July 2, but you can preorder your copy now at Amazon.

Preorder UHF on 4K Blu-ray

$40
title: You've Never Seen Weird Al Like This: UHF Finally Comes To 4K Blu-ray

description:
Oliver Stone's 1987 anti-war epic Platoon, about the horrors of Vietnam, is getting a new, limited-edition release on 4k Blu-ray. The Platoon Limited 4K Steelbool edition will be available on June 4, but preorders are live now and discounted to just $28 at Amazon (normally $40).

Preorder Platoon Limited-Edition Steelbook on 4K Blu-ray

$28 (was $40)
title: Preorder The Limited Edition Of Oliver Stone's Vietnam Classic Platoon On Amazon

description:
Star Wars Day is almost upon us, and if you're looking to show off your love for one of the greatest sci-fi franchises of all time, you should check out Uniqlo's new line of Star Wars T-shirts. Dubbed the Star Wars: Remastered line and designed by the creative director of Uniqlo T-shirts, Kosuke Kawamura, these tees feature vintage designs lifted from the original Star Wars trilogy and remixed with Kawamura's "cut and rebuild" collage style.

The first T-shirt goes all the way back to 1977 and features a graphic print of one of the original Star Wars posters, complete
title: Uniqlo Launches New Star Wars Apparel Line Featuring Awesome Vintage Designs

description:
Amazon's Gaming Week is in full swing, offering big discounts on video games and accessories until May 5. Gaming monitors make up a large portion of the catalog, with hit products from Alienware, Samsung, Asus, and more dropping to some of the best prices of 2024.

One of our favorite deals is for the Samsung 34-Inch Odyssey G5 Ultrawide Gaming Monitor. Typically listed for $550, you can pick up the deluxe screen for just $357 right now. Along with a curved 34-inch display, it offers a 165Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and an impressive 3440 x 1440 resolution. If you're looking for something even bigger (and pricier), check out the
title: 18 Best Gaming Monitor Deals During Amazon Gaming Week

description:
Tetris and 7-Eleven have revealed that they are working on several merchandise products together, including one called the Slurpee + Tetris Handheld Game Device.

According to the product description on 7-Eleven's website, it features an officially licensed Tetris title that plays in full-color on a 1.8 inch screen. It also has a built-in speaker with volume control. The device is powered by three AAA batteries or a USB-C cable.

It'll cost $30 and there isn't a set release date yet--the page only says that it's "Coming Soon." It also seems like the product is only going to be available in the United States, and it's unclear if it'll come to other regions as well. In addition to the game device, this collaboration also includes t-shirts, hoodies, hats, tote bags, and stickers.
title: Tetris And 7-Eleven Are Releasing A Handheld Gaming Device Together

description:
Another build-your-own-bundle is live on Fanatical with a variety of games on offer, and the more games you grab, the cheaper they all are. Nabbing three games in the Platinum Collection Build Your Own Bundle will cost you $10, putting the cost of each one at $3.33. Buy five or more games and the cost per game drops to $3, while adding seven or more games to your bundle drops the costs to $2.86 each.

See on Fanatical

Fanatical Platinum Collection Build Your Own Bundle May 2024

  • Yooka-Laylee Deluxe Digital
title: Fanatical Bundle Gets You 7 Games For Less Than $3 Each, Plus A Chance At Free Stuff

description:
Gray Zone Warfare, a new extraction shooter in the same vein of Escape From Tarkov, has received its first updates following its recent Steam Early Access launch, with two hotfixes looking to address some of the biggest issues players have encountered so far.

Hotfix 1 released the same day as the game's release, and fixed various problems causing server crashes, anti-cheat issues that were preventing players from joining servers, and a bug that caused players to spawn without head, clothes, or the ability to secure containers.

Hotfix 2 released May 2, addressing GPU-related game crashes and a
title: Escape From Tarkov Rival Receives First Hotfix Updates Following Early Access Launch

description: Star Wars Day is almost here, and to celebrate, Secretlab has unveiled a new line of skins for its Titan Evo gaming chairs. If you're looking to give your gaming chair a quick makeover, you can dress it up as a Jedi with these gaming chair skins inspired by the legendary Force-wielding knights.
title: Save On Secretlab's Best Gaming Chair, And Pair It With A New Star Wars-Inspired Skin

description:
With Ori and the Blind Forest and its sequel, developer Moon Studios deconstructed the fundamentals of metroidvania design and honed in on its most alluring aspects. Combined with some of the tightest platforming in the business and an entrancing visual design, the studio's debut IP was a standout hit, leading to heightened anticipation for its next project. Yet, No Rest for the Wicked could not be more different from the enchanting veneer of Ori and the Blind Forest, trading in precise platforming for punishing combat, bright colors for a dark and foreboding medieval world, and tight gameplay for systems that struggle to reign everything in.

No Rest for the Wicked puts you in control of a member of the Cerim, a group of warriors charged with protecting the realm from a plague that turns folks into horrific, almost eldritch creatures. While sailing towards the island of Sacra, your ship is attacked by rebels from the land known as the Risen, leaving you st
title: No Rest For The Wicked Is Brutal And Ambitious, But A Little Confused

description:
Compared to the chunky briefcases of yesteryear, modern-day laptops are technological miracles, and if you're looking for one, Amazon Gaming Week is a good place to start looking. These days you can get plenty of power and performance inside of a sleek package, and with the added punch of Nvidia DLSS or AMD FSR, you're getting plenty of bang for your buck with these deals.

We've highlighted several good options below if you're looking to upgrade. Some laptops work fantastically if you don't plan to travel much with them and just want your desk to be as uncluttered as possible, while other models excel as mobile gaming units. For example, the Acer Predator
title: 9 Best Gaming Laptop Deals During Amazon Gaming Week

description:
Last month, Jonathan Nolan and his wife and producing partner, Lisa Joy, successfully launched Fallout on Prime Video. Prior to that, the duo co-created Westworld for HBO, and Nolan co-wrote The Dark Knight trilogy with his older brother, Christopher Nolan. It's been 12 years since the Nolan brothers closed out their take on Batman in The Dark Knight Rises, but the younger Nolan is still willing to revisit the iconic hero.

"Wouldn’t that be a dream?" Nolan replied during an interview with the YouTube channel Showsha when asked about a potential Batman return. "That period was 10 years of my life [from] when I got the call to work on Batman Begins, and it was epic. Working with Christian [Bale], Heath [Ledger], Morgan Freeman, Michael Caine, and to honor an American icon. If I had the chance to go back and work on that again? Absolutely."

Batman's cinematic adventures are currently being overseen by writer and dir
title: Fallout's Jonathan Nolan Is Up For Writing More Batman Movies

description:
Elden Ring - Shadow of the Erdtree--the expansion to FromSoftware's 2022 action-RPG--is coming next month, and it will add a new layer to the story of one of gaming's most-recent smash hits--and GameSpot's 2022 Game Of The Year. Unfortunately for Elden Ring fans, this extra chapter will be the only DLC expansion, as game director Hidetaka Miyazaki confirmed that no other new content will be coming to the game after it.

Per GamesRadar, Miyazaki made the statement while speaking with Chinese outlet Campfire Camp, where he calls Shadow of the Erdtree the "the first and last DLC" and the "only DLC" in multiple instances. However, in the same interview, Miyazaki does not rule out another game set in the Elden Ring world, though he does not con
title: Elden Ring Shadow Of The Erdtree Is "First And Last DLC," No Other Content Planned

description:
XDefiant, Ubisoft's Call of Duty competitor, is launching on May 21 across Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC. XDefiant will start with a six-week preseason before switching over to a seasonal model similar to other live-service titles.

Announced on Ubisoft's blog, the free-to-play arena shooter will launch on May 21 in preseason. The preseason will include five factions from various Ubisoft's games. The first four are the Cleaners, Libertad, Echelon, and Phantoms, which will be available to everyone immediately. The fifth faction, Dedsec, will be available to unlock or purchase. The preseason also includes 14 maps, five game modes, and 24 weapons. While most game modes will be 6v6, the preseason will also include a 4v4 ranked practice playlist, which includes the same rules as the real ranked mode coming in Season 1.
title: Ubisoft's Call Of Duty Competitor XDefiant Launches On May 21

description: Star Wars has become a multimedia empire over the past 45-plus years. The franchise is so influential that it even has its own annual holiday on May 4. If you want to go back to where it all started this Star Wars Day, a logical place to start would be by watching A New Hope, perhaps as part of a movie marathon with the convenience of a box set. But you could go back even further than that, to the creation of Star Wars. That's where The Making of Star Wars comes in. A trilogy of books covering the first trilogy of films, these pricey hardcover volumes are discounted by $30-$39 at Amazon.
title: The Making Of Star Wars - See How The Original Trilogy Came To Life With These Discounted Books

description:
20 Best Movies To Stream In May 2024 That You Need To Watch Now


May the flicks be with you (sorry). A new month means new movies coming to all your favorite streaming services. And we're rounding up the best ones that you shouldn't miss in May 2024.

This month is bringing plenty of streaming options, both old and new. No matter your taste in film, there's something here for every fan of the silver screen. We've combed through scores of titles coming to the various platforms in May to deliver a list of the best viewing experiences for you. We've got superhero flicks, newly released award-winning films, sports movies, beloved childhood classics, Shrek--you name it.

Some of these movies are expecting a new installment in the franchise at some point in the near future, so you can make sure you're all caught up and refreshed on t
title: 20 Best Movies To Stream In May 2024 That You Need To Watch Now

description:
Every New Netflix Movie Releasing In Summer 2024


It's almost summer and Netflix is primed and ready to premiere its summer movie schedule, starting this Friday with the Pop-Tart origin film, Unfrosted starring Jerry Seinfeld, Melissa McCarthy, Jim Gaffigan, and more.

From there, Netflix is offering action movies, comedies, documentaries, and dramedies as part of this lineup, all the way to early September. With everything from a documentary about the creation of Black Barbie to an action-comedy with Glen Powell pretending he's a hit man, you can find something for everyone this summer.

Subscribers can find all the information below about all the brand-new movie titles hitting Netflix over the next few months.
title: Every New Netflix Movie Releasing In Summer 2024

description:
Call of Duty Warzone Season 3 is upon us, and that means we've got the full patch notes for the latest changes to the highly popular battle royale game. The biggest addition that Season 3 brings is the introduction of Weapon Prestige Camos, which allow players to earn a molten gold skin (called One Trick) for their favorite Modern Warfare 3 weapon after earning a staggering 150,000 Weapon XP. That's a lot of kills.

Future Seasons will add more Weapon Prestige Camos to the game, giving you even more goals to work toward. Season 3 brings a number of highly varied changes to the game as a whole, and you can see them all at the link. One of the most notable is the introduction of Loaded Resurgence, which allows players to choose their preferred loadout for Insurgence. This season will also bring back Lockdown on Rebirth Island, so keep an eye out for that.
title: Call of Duty Warzone Season 3 Reloaded Patch Notes: Weapon Prestige Camos And Balance Changes

description:
Helldivers 2's next Warbond is coming May 9, and we've got all the details below. Over on the PlayStation Blog, developer Arrowhead Game Studios revealed the upcoming guns, secondary utilities, and cosmetics that'll be added to the game this month, and fans of winter-based aesthetics will not be disappointed.

The new guns include the AR-61 Tenderizer, a high-damage assault rifle with a small magazine; the slow-but-impactful SMG-72 Pummeler; and the PLAS-101 Purifier, which appears to be some sort of charge-up energy rifle. The new secondary weapons are an interesting mix too: the G-13 Incendiary Impact, which is an explosive grenade that bathes the area in white phosphorus; the high-damage pistol the P-113 Verdict; and Motivational Shocks, which electrifies your allies, curing them of slowing status effects like
title: Helldivers 2 Devs Set To Add Arctic-Themed Polar Patriots Warbond In May

description:
Are you ready to let's-a go to Super Nintendo World at Universal Orlando? Well, the wait isn't much longer with the park addition confirmed for a 2025 opening. Plus, Universal has detailed in a first-look video exactly what you'll experience after walking through a green warp pipe to transport to Mario and Donkey Kong's universes.

Super Mario Land is the first location parkgoers will experience when entering Super Nintendo World. This area features Peach's Castle as well as Bowser's, which contains a Mario Kart ride within. There is also Mount Beanpole and playable games throughout with a Power-Up Band. For instance, you "can collect coins by punching blocks," according to Universal immersive experiences director Chris Bromby.

Yoshi's Adventure is a part of Super Mario Land, too, serving as a family-friendly ride to search for golden eggs. The attraction
title: Super Nintendo World In Orlando Opens Next Year--Check Out A First Look

description:
THQ Nordic has announced that it will hold the THQ Nordic Digital Showcase on August, 2, 2024. It airs at 12 PM PT / 3 PM ET.

The company stated that there will be brand-new announcements during the showcase, and has confirmed that updates on the Gothic 1 Remake and Titan Quest II will make appearances. So far in 2024, THQ Nordic has released Outcast: A New Beginning, the Alone in the Dark remake, and South Park: Snow Day!

Epic Mickey: Rebrushed is scheduled to launch this year, so it's possible that it will be shown during the show if it doesn't release before August. THQ Nordic also has other games in development that don't have release windows yet, including Project: Minerva, Space for Sale, Tempest Rising, and Wreckreation.

Contin
title: THQ Nordic Digital Showcase Set For August With New Announcements And Updates On Games

description:
If content creation is your bread and butter, there's a good chance you'll be looking for a display to help you create the best videos and images possible. There's no shortage of these to pick from, but if you're a fan of Apple, the company's Apple Studio Display screens are probably very tempting. Like many other Apple products, they're also expensive, but right now you can score a sweet and pretty uncommon deal on this powerful, 27-inch Apple monitor.

Apple Studio Display
title: Apple's Gorgeous 5K Monitor Gets Big Discount At Amazon

description:
In the world of pocket-sized figures, Nendoroids have become popular collectibles for several reasons. These figures tend to look very cute, and they often come bundled with a bunch of swappable accessories. Manufacturer Good Smile Company has produced a ton of these figures, including a line focused on The Legend of Zelda. If you're looking to add to your Legend of Zelda collection, you can grab this adorable figure of Zelda for only $48 (was $59). This particular Zelda figure is often sold out, so we wouldn't be surprised to see it disappear again. Like other Nendoroid figures, it has enough articulation to strike a cool pose and comes with a bunch of accessories.

See at Amazon
title: Zelda Nendoroid From Breath Of The Wild Is Back In Stock And Discounted At Amazon

description:
It's the start of a new month, and like clockwork, new free games are available for Amazon Prime members starting today. Subscribers to the Amazon gaming service can pick up 10 PC games this month, and if you're a fan of Prime Video's Fallout series, you're in for a treat in May. As usual, these titles will be released in waves, with each week bringing new games to add to your collection.

Kicking things off today is the release of Tomb Raider: Game of the Year Edition (GOG key). After years of dormancy, the Tomb Raider franchise made a huge comeback in 2013 with an adventure that showed how Lara Croft became the legendary hunter of relics. An action-packed blockbuster, the first game still holds up pretty well more than a decade after release, and this edition includes the Tomb of the Lost Adventurer expansion, six extra outfits for Lara, and four more characters to pla
title: Amazon Prime Members Get 9 Free Games In May, Including A Trip To Fallout's Wasteland

description:
Cobra Kai, the series continuation of the iconic The Karate Kid film franchise, will return for its sixth and final season on Netflix with 15 episodes and a finale event to be released across three dates. Part 1 of the highly anticipated Season 6 kicks off on July 18, followed by Part 2 premiering on November 28. The finale event is set to wrap up the epic saga in 2025.

Netflix's synopsis for these final episodes reads: "Picking up with Cobra Kai eliminated from the Valley, our senseis and students must decide if and how they will compete in the Sekai Taikai--the world championships of karate." Along with this announcement, Netflix has also shared a new teaser marking the beginning of the end, which you can check out below.

With production initially delayed due to the WGA strike, anticipation has only mounted. Season 5's conclusion left loose ends aplenty, from Kreese's vengeful schemes to the potential romance brewing
title: Cobra Kai's Final Season: Netflix Unveils Premiere Dates and Teaser

description:
Activision Blizzard might be aiming to unveil the next Call of Duty game this month. That's because dataminers uncovered references to a reveal in the latest update for Call of Duty Warzone.

On X (formerly known as Twitter), CharlieIntel highlighted that "s3_cerberus_reveal" was discovered in the files for the Season 3 Reloaded update that dropped earlier this week. What's especially notable is that the Xbox Games Showcase in June will be followed by a mysterious direct that has a Cerberus image attached to it.

Call of Duty 2024 teasers/r
title: Call Of Duty File Text Might, Maybe, Possibly Point To New Game Reveal This Month

description:
A live-action reboot of Masters of the Universe has been stuck in development hell for the better part of two decades, with stops at Warner Bros., Sony Pictures, and most recently, Netflix. Now, the long-stalled project may finally have some momentum. Via The Hollywood Reporter, Netflix has dropped out of the film, and Amazon MGM Studios has stepped in to team with Mattel Films to give Masters of the Universe a theatrical release in 2026.

Kubo and the Two Strings and Bumblebee director Travis Knight will helm the Masters of the Universe movie from a script by Chris Butler. However, the official synopsis for the film suggests that the story will take several liberties with the source material and the origins of He-Man.

"10-year-old Prince Adam who crashed to Earth in a spaceship and was separated from his magical Power Sword--the only link to his ho
title: Amazon Picks Up Live-Action Masters Of The Universe Movie After Netflix Drops It

description:
Between her supporting part in F9: The Fast Saga and her leading roles in Monarch: Legacy of Monsters and Shōgun, Anna Sawai seems to be poised for greater stardom in the future. However, Sawai recently revealed that she was forced to turn down a chance to audition in 2016's Suicide Squad, which could have helped her break out sooner.

At the time, Sawai was a member of a J-Pop girl group, FAKY, and under a strict contract that limited what she could do outside of music. Sawai shared the story during her appearance on The Hollywood Reporter's Awards Chatter podcast. She also recalled being excited about a "big audition" for Suicide Squad because the film's producers "were looking for a Japanese girl" to play Katana.

"I was like, 'This is my chance!' And then I go to my manager and he's like,
title: Shōgun's Anna Sawai Says Her J-Pop Group Made Her Turn Down Suicide Squad Audition

description:
During Star Wars: The Clone Wars, Barriss Offee turned against the Jedi Order and framed her friend, Ahsoka Tano, for bombing the Jedi Temple. That ultimately led to Ahsoka leaving the Jedi behind. Barriss' fate after that series was left unknown, but her dark path will be revealed in the upcoming animated anthology series, Star Wars: Tales of the Empire. In a new preview clip from the show, Barriss' crimes against the Jedi give her an opportunity to escape life imprisonment.

Barriss initially believes that her visitor, Lyn, has come on behalf of the Jedi Council. Instead, the Fourth Sister reveals that she no longer answers to Lyn before preparing to offer Barriss a place among the Inquisitors, the former Jedi who turned against their own kind and hunted them for the Empire.

The trailer for Star Wars: Tales of the Empire has revealed that Barriss' Inquisitor training will put her face-to-face with Darth Vader, the man who exposed her crimes to the
title: New Star Wars: Tales Of The Empire Clip Shows Barriss Offee's Recruitment

description: Evercade EXP-R
title: Preorder Evercade's New Retro Gaming Devices Bundled With Tomb Raider Cartridge At Amazon
